scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && npx postcss --use postcss-import-ext-glob postcss-import postcss-nested -o ./style.css ./assets/css/main.css --no-map --verbose
scripts.watch:css: npm run clean:css && npm run build:css -- --watch
scripts.build:js: npm run clean:js && npx wp-scripts build editor=./assets/js/editor frontend=./assets/js/frontend
scripts.watch:js: npm run clean:js && npm run build:js -- --watch
